name: Convert basketball pitch from node to area - World
description:
Convert [leisure=pitch](https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tag:leisure%3Dpitch) nodes to areas:
- Use aerial imagery to draw areas
- Be sure to copy every node tags to the area (the easiest way is to merge the node into the new area)
- if possible, merge the node with the existing area
